text_transform=”uppercase” text_align=”text-left” uncode_shortcode_id=”905078″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Krupa Zubin[/vc_custom_heading][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”491341″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

‘The one who truly believed’ Architect Krupa Zubin was clearly responsible in creating ZZ Architects. Her belief is the cornerstone on which the firm has grown. Exciting play of materials, judicious use of technology and a design sensibility that is extremely refined, defines the style of Ar.Krupa Zubin. Her dynamic nature and sparkling persona clearly reflects in her work, leaving an everlasting impression.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-prif” heading_semantic=”h1″ text_font=”font-136269″ text_size=”h1″ text_weight=”400″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_align=”text-left” uncode_shortcode_id=”140162″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]Zubin Zainuddin[/vc_custom_heading][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][vc_column_text text_lead=”yes” text_color=”color-prif” uncode_shortcode_id=”133576″ text_color_type=”uncode-palette”]

His work is a constant pursuit of a visionary aesthetic that encompasses all fields of design. He believes that once the trust of a client and the concept of a project is discussed, all else is resolved and everything else ideally falls in place. Despite his notable accomplishments he is driven to constantly reinvent the work the firm delivers.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
